entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 12.
